mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.guwen_name as guwenName ,a.guwen_phone as guwenPhone ,a.guwen_id_number as guwenIdNumber ,a.guwen_photo as guwenPhoto ,a.guwen_shanchang as guwenShanchang ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.guwen_email as guwenEmail ,a.guwen_content as guwenContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM guwen a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.guwen_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.guwenName},'%')
and a.guwen_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.guwenPhone},'%')
and a.guwen_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.guwenIdNumber},'%')
and a.guwen_shanchang like CONCAT('%',#{params.guwenShanchang},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.guwen_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.guwenEmail},'%')
and a.guwen_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.guwenContent},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
